name: fnebas
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: simplbi(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
-| wb(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wa(wceq(c2, c3), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
-| wb(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wa(wceq(c2, c3), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wa(wceq(c2, c3), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1))))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
-| wceq(c3, cuni(c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
-| wceq(c3, cuni(c1))

comment: A finer cover covers the same set as the original. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 28-Sep-2009.)
